website_summaries.verdict: With dual sides, a tray for art supplies, and a sturdy frame, this kids’ easel delivers great value for money. A good option for budding artists.
pros: Features a chalkboard on one side, a dry erase board on the other, and a clip for paper, allowing little ones to experiment with different artistic media
A wide variety of magnetic numbers and letters for use on the magnetic dry erase surface
Well constructed and built to last
cons: Art supplies need to be purchased separately
